article: One night a hotel caught fire , and the people in the hotel ran out in their  _  clothes. Two men stood outside and looked at the fire. "  _  I came out, " said one, "I ran into some of the rooms and found a lot of  money  . People don't think of money when they are  _  . When anyone leaves paper money in a fire, the fire  _  it. So I took all the money I could find.  Someone  will become poorer because I took them." "You don't know me, " said the other, "and you  don't know  my work." "What's your work?" "I'm a policeman." "Oh!"  _  the first man. He thought quickly and said, "And do you know my  _  ? I'm a writer. I'm always telling stories about the things that  _  happened. "
